commenter_b: It looks like a piece of food. Im a Trump supporter. I think these stupid battles between the two are immature and I think making this some huge talking point in the world is exactly why all of us keep electing the wrong people. We care more about a piece of food on someones face then what theyre actually saying. I don't like Cruz. my money is on Trump all the way but we need to all grow up and look at the issues because this isnt Saturday night live. This is real life and the wellbeing of many people is at stake here.
